# 1. Code alignment

Which of the below alignments are correct?

- [ ] a

        abs_area = (area_A + area_B +
          area_C + area_D)

- [x] b

        abs_area = (area_A + area_B 
            + area_C + area_D)

- [ ] c

        result = my_function(area_A, area_B, 
            area_C, area_D)

- [x] d

        result = my_function(area_A, area_B, 
                             area_C, area_D)

- [x] e

        result = my_function(
            area_A, area_B, 
            area_C, area_D
            )
